#math 
> Related: [[11-18 Trigonometry Formulas|11-18 Trigonometry Formulas]], [[Sum and Difference Formula|Sum and Difference Formula]]

## Formulas:
$$
\sin(2\theta) = 2\sin(\theta)\cos(\theta)
$$

^21ef77

$$
\boxed{\cos(2\theta) = \cos^2(\theta)-\sin^2(\theta)=1-2\sin^{2}(\theta)=2\cos^{2}(\theta)-1}
$$
*this one is important ⬆️*
$$
\tan(2\theta) = \frac{2\tan\theta}{1-\tan^{2}\theta}
$$

## Examples:
### Example 1:
$$
\begin{array}{c}
\sin(\frac{11\pi}{3}) \\\\
\sin(2\cdot \frac{11\pi}{6})\\
2\sin\left(\frac{11\pi}{6}\right) \cos \left(\frac{11\pi}{6}\right)\\
\frac{-1}{2} \cdot \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\\
\boxed{ \frac{-\sqrt{3}}{2} }
\end{array}
$$

### Example 2:
$$
\begin{array}{c}
3\cos^{2}t - 3\sin^{2}t \\
3 ( \cos^{2}t - \sin^{2}t)\\
3\cos(2t)
\end{array}
$$
### Example 3:
$$
\begin{array}{c}
\frac{4\tan(\frac{x}{2})}{3-3tan^{2}(\frac{x}{2})} \\
\frac{4\tan(\frac{x}{2})}{3(1-\tan^{2}(\frac{x}{2}))} \\
\frac{2\cdot 2\tan\left(\frac{x}{2}\right)}{3\left(1-\tan^{2}\left(\frac{x}{2}\right)\right)} \\
\frac{2}{3}\tan\left(2\cdot \frac{x}{2}\right)\\
\boxed{\frac{2}{3}\tan x}
\end {array}
$$
## Exercises

### Exercise 1:
![Pasted image 20211129200454.png](data:image/png;base64,) **Find:** $\sin(2\theta)$, $\cos(2\theta)$, $\tan(2\theta)$
$$
\begin{array}{c,c,c}
\sin(\theta) = \frac{8\sqrt{2}}{12} & \cos(\theta) = \frac{4}{12} = \frac{1}{3} & \tan(\theta) = \frac{8\sqrt{2}}{4} \\
\end {array}
$$
```ad-info
title: Solution
collapse: true
==$\sin2\theta$:==
$$
\begin{array}{c}
 2\sin\theta\cos\theta \\ 2\cdot \frac{8\sqrt{2}}{2}\cdot \frac{1}{3} \\ \frac{4\sqrt{2}}{9} 
\sin 2\theta \\ \boxed{\frac{4\sqrt{2}}{9}}
\end {array}
$$
==$\cos2\theta$:==
$$
\begin{array}{c}
2\sin\theta - 2\cos\theta\\
(\frac{1}{3})^{2} - (\frac{8\sqrt{2}}{12})^2\\
\boxed{-\frac{7}{9}}
\end {array}
$$
==$\tan 2\theta$:==
$$
\begin{array}{c}
\frac{2\tan\theta}{1-\tan^{2}\theta}\\
\frac{4\sqrt{2}}{1-8}\\
\boxed{-\frac{4\sqrt{2}}{7}}
\end{array}
$$
```
